# alis_google_spanner_database_roles (Data Source)





## Example Usage

```terraform
data "alis_google_spanner_database_roles" "roles" {
  project  = var.GOOGLE_PROJECT
  instance = var.SPANNER_INSTANCE
  database = "tf-test"
}
```
